name: Descender
description:
Weekly game jam 157

Thema:  Vulnerable Invincible

In "Descender" you need to clear each floor to go deeper down with the elevator.

the game is buggy and not completely finished because we didn't have a lot of time this week.

Controlles
  • WASD: move
  • Mouse: shoot directoin
  • Left mouse click: Shoot
  • Right mouse click: Switch weapon
